en.today: Your words carry much weight today, dearest Aries, thanks to a supportive connection between the Capricorn moon and Mercury. This celestial exchange will be particularly beneficial within financial and business discussions, helping you reap the rewards of your experience and hard work. Unfortunately, a harsh square with Venus suggests you might not win friends in the process. Keep a sharp focus on what you want and deserve, but try not to steamroll essential allies in the process. You'll crave excitement midafternoon when Luna and Mars form an unbalanced aspect, but should think through your actions before moving on impulse.

en.today: You'll have the power to accomplish much and impress colleagues this morning, dear Leo, thanks to a sweet connection between the Capricorn moon and Mercury. Stand in your power while taking credit for all that you bring to the table. An abundance of love washes over you when Venus activates, but be mindful of who you share your soft side with. Now is also a good time to connect with your spirituality to ask for guidance and blessings. Fight to stay on track when Luna and Mars form an unbalanced aspect midafternoon, especially if your electronics trigger too many distractions.

en.today: Open up to someone you trust this morning, darling Gemini, as the Capricorn moon and Mercury align. This energy brings empowering and transformative vibes your way, though it may be necessary to reach outside of yourself for additional encouragement. Now is also a good time to acknowledge what or who in your life needs releasing. Watch out for envy within your social sphere when Venus becomes agitated, and avoid partaking in unhealthy conversations or dynamics. You may feel slightly out of sorts when Luna and Mars form an unbalanced connection midafternoon, and you should avoid acting on impulse.
